channel.title: Do you think that Valve should give the BMS Devs Jobs?
channel.description:
I sure do. after reviewing the home page for the umpteenth time, i can honestly say that this game looks better than the original Half-Life. Now of course this isn't a substitute for the original Half-Life, but damn i really want to play this.
What im trying to get at is that the BMS team should really be hired by a game company, and get paid for their games, rather than just making free mods
EDIT: Can a mod please fix the title :smiley:

item.title: Do you think that Valve should give the BMS Devs Jobs?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
See there is nothing really wrong with this thread except:

  1. The question was “should valve hire BM devs” and the answer is “yes”. There is really nothing to discuss beyond that.
  2. Everyone seems to be aware of number 1 except for the OP?

What no one realizes tho is that the whole black mesa dev team is already working for valve on the episode 3 game. black mesa is ded. everyone go home.

Closing thread now that OP is sufficiently crispy.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think that Valve should give the BMS Devs Jobs?

item.title: Do you think that Valve should give the BMS Devs Jobs?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Bolteh:

People in this forum tend to lie about their age so they can be attentionwhores in specific threads.

Also: silly grades system. Is it really that hard to go in terms of 6? Kindergarten: 2 to 6 -> Elementary: 6 to 12 -> High School: 12 to 18?

So 9th grade is what? 9 years old?

Kindergarten (grade 0) generally begins when you’re 5 years old. 9th grade would generally be 14 years old. 9 years old would generally be 4th grade.

And anyone not out of school yet are immature little shits who don’t know the real world yet. :3

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think that Valve should give the BMS Devs Jobs?

item.title: Do you think that Valve should give the BMS Devs Jobs?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Bolteh:

People in this forum tend to lie about their age so they can be attentionwhores in specific threads.

Also: silly grades system. Is it really that hard to go in terms of 6? Kindergarten: 2 to 6 -> Elementary: 6 to 12 -> High School: 12 to 18?

So 9th grade is what? 9 years old?

I’m guessing 9th grade is the 9th year of school (excluding kindergarten), so that would be the third year of high school (derde middelbaar), i.e. 14 years old, which seems to be the case.
Of course, I’m just guessing.

Also, I just realized I’ve never been properly flamed on the BM forums. GIVE ME ALL YOU’VE GOT BITCHES

Read full topic

item.title: Do you think that Valve should give the BMS Devs Jobs?
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
SwampFox56:

why??

Using more than one question mark indicates a lack of maturity. Spelling errors indicate fast typing, or having English as a second language, this either indicates that this person rushes in such tasks, or does not understand the basic concept of grammar. This person’s average age from their posts is 13, and therefore falls into the rules of the No Flaming Category, so I will leave him alone.

What?

:3
